CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.Name = 'Treatment centre Install',"- Solids filter"&BR()&"- Chair movements and memory positions"&BR()&"- Headrest movements"&BR()&"- Armrest movement"&BR()&"- Cleaning instructions"&BR()&"- Ambidextrous chair change round"&BR()&"- Lamp settings"&BR()&"- Handpieces water controls"&BR()&"- Electric motor control"&BR()&"- 3 in 1 tips compatible",IF(RecordType.Name = 'Compressor installation certificate',"- How to drain and how often"&BR()&"- Condensate bottle"&BR()&"- Overload reset button",IF(RecordType.Name = 'Suction Pump installation certificate',"- Suction filter"&BR()&"- Amalgam alarm"&BR()&"- Amalgam pot cleaning"&BR()&"(only required if machine alarms)",IF(RecordType.Name = 'Intra-oral x-ray installation certificate Belmont',"- Control panel settings",''))))
CustomField.label: Handover points to demonstrate
